recycle_activities.title: Paper Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Recycle used paper products such as newspapers, magazines, and cardboard to reduce waste and conserve resources.

recycle_activities.title: Plastic Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Dispose of plastic containers, bottles, and packaging in designated recycling bins to promote sustainability and minimize pollution.

recycle_activities.title: Glass Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Collect glass bottles and jars separately for recycling, enabling the production of new glass products while conserving energy.

recycle_activities.title: Metal Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Recycle metals like aluminum and steel to reduce the need for raw material extraction and decrease environmental impact.

recycle_activities.title: Battery Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Dispose of used batteries at recycling centers to prevent hazardous materials from entering landfills and facilitate the recovery of valuable metals.

recycle_activities.title: Electronic Waste Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Recycle old electronic devices, such as computers and cell phones, to recover valuable materials and prevent harmful chemicals from polluting the environment.

recycle_activities.title: Composting
recycle_activities.description: Convert food scraps and yard waste into nutrient-rich compost to enrich soil, reduce landfill waste, and support sustainable gardening.

recycle_activities.title: Textile Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Donate or recycle old clothing and textiles to extend their lifespan, reduce waste, and support sustainable fashion practices.

recycle_activities.title: Tire Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Properly dispose of used tires at recycling facilities to prevent them from becoming breeding grounds for pests and mosquitoes and utilize the rubber for various applications.

recycle_activities.title: Kitchen Waste Recycling
recycle_activities.description: Implement a composting system for kitchen scraps like vegetable peels and coffee grounds, reducing landfill waste and creating nutrient-rich soil.
